title: Meg Hillier – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Meg Hillier, the Labour MP for Hackney South and Shoreditch, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
The people of Hackney deserve so much better than this shambolic Conservative Party playing at government, crashing the economy and failing people.
